description: Triangle of coefficients of Chebyshev's U(n,2*x-1) polynomials (exponents of x in decreasing order).
comments: A000302 (powers of 4), A002699, A002700 unsigned column sequences for m=0..2.G.f. for row polynomials U(n,2*x-1) and row sums same as for A053124.With offset 1 this is also the coefficient triangle of 2* U(2*n-1,x) expanded in decreasing powers of x. W. Lang, Mar 07 2007.
references: C. Lanczos, Applied Analysis. Prentice-Hall, Englewood Cliffs, NJ, 1956, p. 518.
Theodore J. Rivlin, Chebyshev polynomials: from approximation theory to algebra and number theory, 2. ed., Wiley, New York, 1990.
